thread.title: BlackRock's Rieder: 'Window is closing' on rate hike
thread.title_full: BlackRock's Rieder: 'Window is closing' on rate hike

author: cnbc.com
title: BlackRock's Rieder: 'Window is closing' on rate hike
text:
BlackRock Chief Investment Officer of fundamental fixed income Rick Rieder believes that the window for the U.S. Federal Reserve to raise interest rates is closing, he said in an interview on Monday.
Scott Mlyn | CNBC Rick Rieder, BlackRock While Rieder hopes the Fed will still begin raising rates in September, the current market volatility is making it difficult, he said.
"I think they should go and I think the markets would be in better shape if they do, but that being said I think the confluence of opinion around if they will go has waned," Rieder said.
Read More The Fed hike could LOWER interest rates
And if the Fed does not raise rates in September, Rieder thinks it is unlikely they will do so later in the year, he said.
